name: Savior Saga: Idle RPG
storyline: Join Yuina’s mysterious, yet beautiful journey to find the Dragon Heart while protecting her from endless waves of monsters creeping out from the Devil’s Hall. Strategically collect, upgrade, and build parties of strong, unique Heroes that will adventure alongside Yuina.
summary: In Savior Saga, your heroes will join Yuina’s journey for Dragon Heart and help protect her from endless waves of monsters creeping out from Devil’s Hall. You will be able to collect and upgrade various heroes that each possess their own unique skills.
